_description: This warm start setting restores the whole variables.

model._description: The model from which to warm-start the model parameters.

vars_to_warm_start._description: Regular expressions for the name of trainable variables. Multiple expressions can be assigned by comma. Default is '.*' (all variables)

load_only_trainable_vars._description: If checked, only trainable variables in the model graph are considered. If not checked, all variables are considered.

checkpoint_exclude_scopes._description: Scopes to exclude in the checkpoint.

name: BasicWarmStart
